document_data.name: Aniolon Gruanthe

document_data.mainbody: '''Aniolon Gruanthe''' was a wizard from [[Estagund]] who led a number of other arcanists and malcontents away from the kingdom to found the town of [[Lliiress]]. He made a deal for the protection of the [[blue dragon]] [[Gerinvioch]]; after the dragon trapped the town with the ''[[Evise Jhontil]]'', Aniolon was slain by the artifact.
document_data.Description: He had stubby fingers, thinning black hair, but he was rather young,{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|166}}
document_data.Personality:
Aniolon Gruanthe was enthralled by power over other people,{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|168-169}} but was swift to resort to bizarre schemes, such as entreating with a dragon, for the sake of obtaining it.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|163}} He cared for the people under his reign only nominally.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|171}}

He pitied those who served something they didn't believe in.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|165}}
document_data.Abilities: Gruanthe could cast at least one ''[[scrying]]'' spell. He also could bind [[imp]]s to his service.
document_data.Possessions: Aniolon wore the accoutrements of a wizard.
document_data.Relationships: Aniolon briefly bound the imp [[Quiono]] in {{yearlink|976}}.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The [[blue dragon]] [[Gerinvioch]] taunted [[Kinase Bronihim]] with the name of Gruanthe.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|159}}
